newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Moroccan illegal immigrants dumped on home beach.
newsitem.headline: Moroccan illegal immigrants dumped on home beach.

text.p: Seventeen Moroccans trying to get illegally to Spain splashed ashore after being dropped 100 yards off what they were told was the Spanish coast, the Moroccan daily newspaper l'Opinion said on Monday.
But the immigrants, peasants from the town of Larache, instead found themselves landing in the nearby north Moroccan city of Tangier, the daily said, quoting a police source.
The men, aged up to 30, had paid a middleman, who sailed off into the night, 7,000 dirhams ($740) each to cross the Strait of Gibraltar. Police arrested the would-be illegal immigrants.
